nodes.bodyText: This is not a breaking change, you are adding an optional field. It's just that this will be hidden from conjure backcompat the way it is written
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,11 +36,13 @@ types:
           requestId: uuid
           requestorId: uuid
           numTransactions: integer
+          lastKnownVersion: LastKnownVersion
       ConjureStartTransactionsResponse:
         fields:
           immutableTimestamp: LockImmutableTimestampResponse
           timestamps: PartitionedTimestamps
           lease: Lease
+          lockWatchUpdate: LockWatchStateUpdate

nodes.bodyText: Yeah, the response is fine, but the request is the break
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,11 +36,13 @@ types:
           requestId: uuid
           requestorId: uuid
           numTransactions: integer
+          lastKnownVersion: LastKnownVersion
       ConjureStartTransactionsResponse:
         fields:
           immutableTimestamp: LockImmutableTimestampResponse
           timestamps: PartitionedTimestamps
           lease: Lease
+          lockWatchUpdate: LockWatchStateUpdate

nodes.bodyText: the request parameter is also optional, and so won't be a break either.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Please add information about the new product dependency.
